page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: In the grid squares NY0436,NY0435, NY6535 +NY0536 can be found the resedential area of Ewanrigg,Ellenborough,Netherton and Hillside.These together with the old Netherhall estate are in the South East of Maryport. EWANRIGG HOUSING ESTATE NY0435. This consists of 709 dwellings built in the 1950's by the North Housing Association.With in the grid square are 330 semi-detatched houses,67 terraced and 10 flats.These are made of rendered roughcast brickwork with slate roofs.The gardens to the front and back are medium sized.There are also 16 old peoples bungalows,4 private bungalows and 2 detatched houses.There are several areas of amenities;open space,BMX track,boys club,junior school,+grocers shop.Area bounded by grazing,farm=Ewanrigg Hall.
